definition: (loanword) bye-bye/also pr. [bai1 bai1] etc/(coll.) to part ways (with sb)/(fig.) to have nothing further to do (with sb or sth)
to pay one's respects by bowing with hands in front of one's chest clasping joss sticks, or with palms pressed together/(Tw) religious ceremony in which offerings are made to a deity

sentences.chinese: 直到呯的一聲倒下說拜拜。

sentences.english: So, you are sure to seize this good opportunity to say goodbye, and fleshy.
sentences.chinese: 於是，你肯定要抓住這個好時機，和肉肉說拜拜。

sentences.english: He sits up on his back legs and puts his front paws together before the altar .
sentences.chinese: 牠會用後腿坐立在祭壇前，前腳合掌拜拜。

sentences.english: We recently turned to turkey sausage and never looked back.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我們轉向火雞腸，而向香腸說“拜拜”。

sentences.english: Friday, personal email? That equals goodbye lunch as in byebye.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，個人郵箱？直接等於散夥飯，就是拜拜。

sentences.english: Bye. Don't forget about that note.
Say good-bye to tarnish on brass, copper, or stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 對光澤暗淡的銅器，黃銅，或者不鏽鋼說拜拜。

sentences.english: For a ritual we pratice every four years.
sentences.chinese: 這是美國四年一度的大拜拜。

sentences.english: Suddenly, Angela popped up with a forever adios.
sentences.chinese: 突然，安吉拉閃出來，要永遠跟我說拜拜。

sentences.english: Let's go out for our work, bye-bye, S. W.
sentences.chinese: 我們要出去事變了，拜拜，白雪。

sentences.english: Do people want the file system to go bye-bye?
sentences.chinese: 人們真打算和文件系統說拜拜了嗎？

sentences.english: Thanks Tony. Say hello to May, bye.
Girl: You know what, we shouldn't have been together, so byebye then.
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎，我們不應該在一起，拜拜了。

sentences.english: I want to sleep, good storm ah, bye.
sentences.chinese: 我要睡覺了，好睏啊，拜拜。

definition: see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
aw, fuck! (loanword from Korean 아! 씨발!)
(coll.) to beat it/to take French leave
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
don't bother to see me out
phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
